tika.dc.description: Learn how to build key aspects of web, cloud, and mobile solutions with F#. This book shows you how to handle concurrency, asynchrony, big data, and other server-side challenges by combining this language with different technologies and tools on the .NET Framework. You’ll quickly learn how to be productive with F#, whether you want to use it to build the next Twitter, or integrate it into your software application.
